name: A Little Ambulance in Action Free: 3D Fun Exciting Driving for Kids with Cute Emergency Car
name_original: A Little Ambulance in Action Free: 3D Fun Exciting Driving for Kids with Cute Emergency Car
description:
There is an emergency. An ambulance is coming to the rescue. The vehicles let it pass, the doctor on board prepares for the situation, the driver concentrates - it's a common day for common heroes. Doctor and driver, a well trained team to rescue adults and kids in case of a medical issue. And those white vehicles with their sirens on top... they are so unique!
Kids always want to be heroes. Sometimes rescuing a princess, sometimes being doctors, sometimes driving special vehicles. A cute, free 3D game will now transform your kid to a hero, to a doctor and a driver in one person, to a rescue hero with a white, noisy vehicle. Games on phones tend to entertain kids, but cute 3D games with ambulances have superior effect on kids imagination: the possibility of a rescue, passing all vehicles freely driving a special white vehicle makes kids happy and having incredible fun. Boys are specially fond of ambulances.
Please consult your kid and your doctor before you get this cute, free 3D game and participate in the rescue with the driver and the doctor of the ambulance. Don't believe, that's easy - even the 3D world looks cute common heroes, like the driver of the ambulance must do their jobs with professionalism concentrating only on the job, not on the 3D cartoon cuteness.
We recommend to concentrate on both. For your safety and fun!

Features
- Unique driving experience with alternate controls. Controls are switchable.
- Special challenges, as High Traffic, Crossroads, Moving Machinery, other obstacles...
- You can level up in 5 different areas to earn extra profits and proof your driving skills
- Beautifully crafted 3D Cartoon environment
- Different ambulance cars to drive with unique Settings for better driving experience
- Customizable gameplay with numerous upgrades
- Lots of different power-ups
